backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, jobs, applications, credit usage, and related maps plus authorization mixin and comparison helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a fix for a ManualAuthProvider runtime error and listing impacted files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing multiple frontend components, pages, and utilities involved in routing, auth, jobs, and UI features.
frontend/docs/missing-canister-functions: Documentation listing required backend methods for diagnostics and instructions for detecting missing actor methods.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS file defining global OKLCH theme variables, light/dark palettes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping RouterProvider with ManualAuthProvider and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/auth/manualAuthTypes.ts: Type definitions for manual auth including UserRole, session shape, and login credentials.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCredi: UI for viewing and updating the credit cost per candidate unlock using admin mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEmplo: Displays all employers with credit balances and allows admins to add or deduct credits via dialog actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminJobse: Lists all jobseekers with basic status information in a table.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMetri: Shows dashboard metric cards for employers, jobseekers, and total credits used.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUnloc: Displays flattened unlock activity logs including employer, candidate, credits used, and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component with branding, caffeine.ai link, and simple navigation links.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with logo, role‑based navigation, auth dropdown, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapping header and footer while applying role-based class and rendering children.
frontend/src/components/applications/Can: Empty placeholder file for a candidate application form component.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Empty placeholder file for an Internet Identity help dialog component.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginPage.t: Login page handling manual auth for jobseekers, employers, and admins with role‑based navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Route wrapper that restricts access based on authentication state and required user roles.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleSetupMo: Empty placeholder file for a role setup modal component.
frontend/src/components/employer/Candida: Employer card showing candidate details with locked/unlocked view and an unlock confirmation flow.
frontend/src/components/employer/UnlockC: Dialog component that displays credit cost, balance, and confirmation for unlocking a candidate profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Provides admin-focused queries and mutations for employers, jobseekers, unlock logs, and credit management.
frontend/src/hooks/useEmployerCredits.ts: Hooks to fetch employer credit balance and credit cost per profile unlock.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useManualAuth.tsx: Implements a simple manual auth system with localStorage-backed sessions and role handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and retrieving the candidate directory.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnlockCandidate.ts: Mutation hook to unlock a candidate profile and refresh related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes and role-specific accent variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
Admin dashboard with metrics and tabbed views for employers, jobseekers, credits, and unlock logs.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerCandidatesPag: Loads and filters candidate directory for employers, supports searching, skill filtering, and unlocking profiles with credit checks.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerDashboardPage: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerJobApplicatio: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/JobDetailPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/JobsBrowsePage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero, features, and calls to action for jobseekers and employers.
frontend/src/utils/actorDiagnostics.ts: Provides utilities to check backend actor methods and log missing methods for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrorMessages.ts: Normalizes actor-related errors into user-friendly messages and detects missing method errors.
frontend/src/utils/actorGuards.ts: Defines guards to ensure actor methods exist and provides a safe wrapper for invoking them.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats and parses INR currency values, including compact lakh formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters across navigation, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state for a mobile-first job portal, including architecture decisions, known issues, and existing feature records with versioning.
